personalInfo.name: Calum Kershaw
personalInfo.title: AI Systems Developer & Process Analyst
personalInfo.summary: Technology leader who translates business priorities into working systems. Combines hands-on AI development with operations experience to deliver tools that reduce manual work, improve information flow, and help teams make better decisions faster.

experience.description: Delivering AI-powered automation systems for business clients. Translating operational pain points into structured technology solutions.
highlights: Blackbird Brewing: AI email automation with 17-category classifier, ~120 emails/week
JollyTails Resort: RAG knowledge base consolidating 20+ SOPs
Multi-agent workflows for parallel task execution
MCP server for cross-tool project memory

experience.description: Systematic data profiling and process analysis for high-capacity pet care operations.
highlights: Improved KPIs ~10% through data profiling and process optimization
Technology liaison translating operational needs to system requirements

experience.company: St. Francis Xavier University, Advancement Office
experience.description: Designed dashboards and data quality checks for donor and alumni data systems.
highlights: Power BI dashboards with rule-based quality checks
SQL queries for data extraction and reporting
Root cause analysis on legacy system inconsistencies

experience.description: Scaled operations and designed workflows for campus food bank during rapid growth.
highlights: Scaled operations to support 140+ additional users
300% increase in operational hours through workflow design
